name: Arr Matey / fun.json
description: This be th' pirate (Arr Matey) translations for th' `Fun` cog o' the bot.
author: ScarlxtPink

data.fun.joke.description: This be th' `/joke` command — fetches a random jest from th' briny web.
data.fun.joke.error: Couldn' fetch a joke, matey. Try again later.
data.fun.eightball.description: This be th' `/8ball` command that gives a fate-ful answer t' a yes/no question.
data.fun.eightball.title: Magic 8-Ball o' Fate
data.fun.eightball.response.12: Better not be tellin' ye now.
data.fun.coinflip.description: This be th' `/coinflip` command — flip a coin an' see if it be heads or tails.
data.fun.coinflip.title: Flip'n th' Coin
data.fun.coinflip.result.heads: Th' coin came up Heads, aye!
data.fun.coinflip.result.tails: Th' coin came up Tails, aye!
data.fun.roll.description: This be th' `/roll` command — roll X dice o' Y sides each.
data.fun.roll.error.invalid_format: Bad format! Use XdY (e.g. 2d6) t' roll.
data.fun.roll.error.too_many_dice: Ye can' roll more than {max_dice} dice at once, matey.
data.fun.roll.error.too_many_sides: Dice can' have more than {max_sides} sides, savvy?
data.fun.roll.error.non_positive_integers: Dice an' sides must be positive integers, ye hear.
data.fun.roll.error.higher_than_one: Ye must roll at least a one-sided die, arr.
data.fun.roll.title: Roll o' the Dice
